content: Chipmaker Microsemi Corp  said on Tuesday it would buy rival PMC-Sierra Inc  in a $2.5 billion deal  a day after Skyworks Solutions Inc  walked away from a bidding war.
name: Microsemi Corporation
title: Microsemi to buy PMC-Sierra in $2.5 bln deal as Skyworks bows out

content: Nov 24 Chipmaker Microsemi Corp said on Tuesday it would buy rival PMC-Sierra Inc in a $2.5 billion deal  a day after Skyworks Solutions Inc walked away from a bidding war.
name: Microsemi Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Microsemi to buy PMC-Sierra in $2.5 bln deal as Skyworks bows out

name: Microsemi Corporation
title: Microsemi hikes offer for PMC-Sierra  which prefers Skyworks' bid

content: Nov 2 Chipmaker PMC-Sierra Inc said Microsemi Corp's latest stock and cash proposal is not superior to Skyworks Solutions Inc's all-cash offer  which provides "more value certainty" to shareholders.
name: Microsemi Corporation
title: PMC-Sierra says Microsemi's new bid not superior to Skyworks offer

content: Oct 30 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Friday:
name: Microsemi Corporation
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: Microsemi Corp  hiked its offer to buy PMC-Sierra Inc  to about $2.33 billion  topping a $2.27 billion bid from Skyworks Solutions Inc  and extending - but perhaps not ending - a bidding war that started almost two weeks ago.
name: Microsemi Corporation
title: Microsemi tops Skyworks' offer for PMC as bidding war intensifies

content: Oct 30 Microsemi Corp hiked its offer to buy PMC-Sierra Inc to about $2.33 billion  topping a $2.27 billion bid from Skyworks Solutions Inc and extending - but perhaps not ending - a bidding war that started almost two weeks ago.
name: Microsemi Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-Microsemi tops Skyworks' offer for PMC as bidding war intensifies

content: Oct 30 Chipmaker Microsemi Corp raised its offer to buy PMC-Sierra Inc to about $2.33 billion  marginally above a rival bid worth $2.27 billion from Skyworks Solutions Inc.
name: Microsemi Corporation
title: Microsemi tops Skyworks' bid for PMC-Sierra

content: Oct 30 Chipmaker Skyworks Solutions Inc  raised its offer to buy PMC-Sierra Inc to about $2.27 billion  marginally above a rival bid worth $2.25 billion from Microsemi Corp.
name: Microsemi Corporation
title: Skyworks Solutions raises bid for PMC-Sierra  trumps Microsemi

content: Oct 19 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 1500 GMT on Monday:
name: Microsemi Corporation
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: Chipmaker Microsemi Corp offered to buy PMC-Sierra Inc for about $2.2 billion  trumping a $2 billion offer from Skyworks Solutions Inc  to expand its offerings for telecom  data center and cloud customers.
name: Microsemi Corporation
title: Chipmaker Microsemi trumps Skyworks' bid for PMC-Sierra

content: Oct 20 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 1600 GMT on Tuesday:
name: Microsemi Corporation
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: * PMC shares rise 15 pct  Microsemi shares fall 5 pct   (Adds details from conference call  analyst comment  background; update shares)
name: Microsemi Corporation
title: UPDATE 3-Chipmaker Microsemi trumps Skyworks' bid for PMC-Sierra

content: Oct 20 PMC-Sierra Inc said Microsemi Corp's $2.2 billion unsolicited offer for the chipmaker could lead to a "superior proposal".
name: Microsemi Corporation
title: PMC-Sierra says Microsemi offer may lead to "superior proposal"

content: Oct 19 Chipmaker Microsemi Corp said it had offered to buy chipmaker PMC-Sierra Inc in a deal valued at about $2.4 billion.
name: Microsemi Corporation
title: Chipmaker Microsemi offers to buy PMC-Sierra in $2.4 bln deal
